title: Dar-otter, Pearl Otter, Can’t Find Me
description: Dar-otter, Pearl otter, Can't find me was first published in issue 10 of Wet Ink Magazine.Tarn is a dar-otter forced into slavery by the men who have hidden his fur. Without it he can never return to his otter form and he is trapped as a man. He longs for freedom again.Mina is human; her life has been planned according to the stars she was born under, including who she should marry. She doesn’t love her husband-to-be, instead she watches Tarn and longs to fall into the sea and into his embrace.But they are from two different worlds, and finding freedom will take everything they have.First published in issue 10 of Wet Ink Magazine.
author: Shona Husk
